verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1473>captives<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> that the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
In the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3112>Jehoiachin's<s%> <S%H1546>captivity,<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H1961>expressly<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H941>Buzi,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

And I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H7307>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5591><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and a <S%H784>fire<s%> enfolding <S%H3947>itself,<s%> and a <S%H5051>brightness<s%> was <S%H5439>about<s%> it, and out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> thereof as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Also out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> thereof came the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> living <S%H2416>creatures.<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> was their <S%H4758>appearance;<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> had the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And their <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of their <S%H7272>feet<s%> was like the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of a <S%H5695>calf's<s%> <S%H7272>foot:<s%> and they <S%H5340>sparkled<s%> like the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And they had the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides;<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had their <S%H6440>faces<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

Their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H269>another;<s%> they <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when they <S%H1980>went;<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the right <S%H3225>side:<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> on the left <S%H4480>side;<s%> <S%H8040><s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> also had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>

Thus were their <S%H6440>faces:<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H6504>stretched<s%> <S%H4480>upward;<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> wings of every <S%H376>one<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> one to <S%H376>another,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward:<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> to <S%H1980>go,<s%> they <S%H1980>went;<s%> and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H3940>lamps:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5051>bright,<s%> and out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning.<s%>
And the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H7519>ran<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a flash of <S%H965>lightning.<s%>

Now as I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> with his <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was like unto the <S%H5869>color<s%> of a <S%H8658>beryl:<s%> and they <S%H702>four<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness:<s%> and their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was <S%H834>as<s%> it <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H212>wheel<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>
When they <S%H1980>went,<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides:<s%> and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

As for their <S%H1354>rings,<s%> they were so <S%H1363>high<s%> that they were <S%H3374>dreadful;<s%> and their <S%H1354>rings<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H702>four.<s%>

And when the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> them: and when the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up.<s%>

Whithersoever <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> to <S%H1980>go,<s%> they <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> was their <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H1980>go;<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

When those <S%H1980>went,<s%> these <S%H1980>went;<s%> and when those <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when those were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

And the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H7140>crystal,<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> were their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H3477>straight,<s%> the <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H269>other:<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two,<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on this <S%H2007>side,<s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two,<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on that <S%H2007>side,<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

And when they <S%H1980>went,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1999>speech,<s%> as the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H4264>host:<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> they let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and had let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> it, from the <S%H4480>appearance<s%> <S%H4758><s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>appearance<s%> <S%H4758><s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4295>downward,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and it had <S%H5051>brightness<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

As the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one that <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>
